body:
So I've been playing on Avicus for about half a year now, but I don't think this community really knows me, so I decided to make an AMA.

Let me introduce myself a little. I'm originally from Overcast, but a few friends asked me to play with them on Avicus, so I did and that is how I first joined. I'm currently on PowerPuff Boys who won the 2nd tournament for Avicus. I don't play this game as much as I used to anymore, but if any of you play LoL (League of Legends) feel free to add me as "ID10".

Ask away!

replies.body: I for whatever reason remembered watching this (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fZX9WuaPC-Q) video. All I remembered was the part where the guy was by the lava, so I just thought of the name "lavablock". I don't know why I put the numbers beside it though.
